translations.meta_description_general: Discover a new gaming experience on a free and addictive Minecraft server! Browse our Skyblock or Creative game modes and become a legend!
translations.title_legend_sub: Join us now and mark the community with your skill!
translations.title_store_sub_1: The store allows you to enjoy exclusive in-game benefits while supporting HypariaMC
translations.title_store_sub_2: to improve the server over and over again and optimize your gaming experience.
translations.title_username: Please enter your Minecraft username to continue
translations.title_username_sub: If you would like to offer a gift to a player, please enter their own Minecraft username when adding the package in your cart.
translations.title_can_continue: It is thanks to you that we can continue
translations.title_can_continue_desc: Whilst all aspects of the server will always be freely available to all players, it requires an incredible amount of hard work to manage a server of this scale. It is thanks to you that this work can be done so that HypariaMC can live and continue to better itself.
translations.title_payment_completed_sub: Please login to HypariaMC Network (mc.hyparia.org) to receive your order. Thank you!
translations.title_wiki_sub_2: Here you can find all the useful information for the game.
translations.title_vote_sub: Support us and earn rewards by voting on one of the links below:
translations.game_skyblock_desc: Have you ever dreamed of an adventure on an island, alone or with friends? It can become reality… Conquer a new world by shaking up your habits. Between survival and reflection, develop your island to make it as great as possible while completing many challenges. Throughout your celestial adventure, discover many extras such as an evolving shop, skills to develop, daily tournaments and much more… Will you become the master of the skies?
translations.game_skyblock_advantage_4: Insane bosses like DarthVader and JonSnow…
translations.game_skyblock_advantage_5: PVP map with event every hour
translations.game_creative_desc: Do you want to express your imagination freely? Our Creative is for you! This sandbox server gives you a wide range of possibilities such as building, terraforming, creating RP maps or even jumps… Discover other players' creations thanks to our complete system of warps allowing you to search by theme or by features! As we know that your creations are very precious, you can take advantage of our backup system to avoid any fear of grievances. What are you waiting for to surprise us?
translations.game_creative_advantage_4: Settings for access granted to Visitors, Coops, Members…
translations.game_creative_advantage_5: Starting themes (grand canyon, floating island, forest…)
translations.wiki_introduction: Please click on one of the topics below to start your navigation...
translations.cart_order_summary_desc: Need any questions answered before checkout? Ask the community or team members on our Discord.
translations.expression_what_are_you_waiting_for_join: What are you waiting for to join the
translations.expression_hyparia_and_its_community: HypariaMC and its community in action
